To compare the current flora to that of 1894, and to correlate them with climate and urban changes, Ellenberg indicator values (EIVs)
22 were applied to the Italian flora
23 and to exotic species
24 . As EIVs for neophytes were not available in the literature, the indices were calculated by comparison with known species growing in the same habitat following the method of Domina et al.
24 . To ascertain the difference between the modern and ancient flora, the SÃ¸rensen similarity index was calculated
